snippet: GREENBERG--Molly, on February 1, 2016 at 99 years of age. Beloved wife of the late Milton. Devoted and loving mother of Margie and the late Paul Smith, Larry and Judy Greenberg. Cherished and adoring grandmother and great-grandmother, sister, aunt, great-aunt, cousin and friend. Sincerest love, thanks, and gratitude to Marie and Cynthia for Molly's wonderful care. Donations in Molly's name can be made to the Brain Aneurysm Foundation or a charity of your choice. Services Wednesday, February 3, 2016 at Riverside Nassau North Chapels, 55 North Station Plaza, Great Neck, NY. 1/3
